name: Diaspora Empowerment
reflectionPrompt: Where can diaspora talent reconnect to a real homeland problem?
majorMove: Invite one diaspora builder into a shared project thread this week.

name: Mindset Shift & Resilience
reflectionPrompt: What setback can become an asset if I reframe it?
majorMove: Write a “setback → strategy” note; take 1 action today.

name: Gamified Education
reflectionPrompt: What skill could become a 7-day quest?
majorMove: Draft a 7-step quest outline and share it with one person.

name: Blockchain & Decentralization
reflectionPrompt: What should the community own in this project?
majorMove: Draft an ownership map (who owns what, and why).

name: Community & Collaboration
reflectionPrompt: What role do I play best on a team?
majorMove: Define 3 roles for your project; recruit for 1 role.

name: Localized AI & Personalization
reflectionPrompt: What local language/story must the AI understand?
majorMove: Write 10 local examples/phrases your AI should recognize.

name: Holistic Wellness & Balance
majorMove: Schedule one non-negotiable recovery block this week.

name: Security & Compliance
reflectionPrompt: What data am I collecting that I don’t need?
majorMove: Remove/stop collecting one unnecessary data field.

name: Data-Driven Performance & Analytics
reflectionPrompt: Which metric would prove progress in 30 days?
majorMove: Pick 3 metrics; set a weekly review ritual.

name: Legacy & Long-Term Impact
reflectionPrompt: If this runs 10 years, what should it become?
